title: metrics-related BytesSafeAfterClose() infinite loop
body:
Using bleve with the recent BytesSafeAfterClose() optimization (commit 11262c793f1d), and with the bleve metrics KVStore wrapper (around leveldb), I somehow got an infinite loop.

btw, I was playing around with field based boosting search, like "title:PR-2341^" when the infinite loop happened... not sure if that's related.

Unfortunately, goroutine stack dump seems to have elided the most interesting stack frames, but here it is anyways...

runtime: goroutine stack exceeds 1000000000-byte limit
fatal error: stack overflow

runtime stack:
runtime.throw(0x4a765b9)
    /usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:491 +0xad
runtime.newstack()
    /usr/local/go/src/runtime/stack.c:784 +0x555
runtime.morestack()
    /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:324 +0x7e

goroutine 178 [stack growth]:
